The claim was published on a satirical a: com, which is known for producing fictional content.
The disclaimer page of GomerBlog: com clearly states that all articles on the site are fake and not intended to provide medical advice or diagnose medical conditions.
GomerBlog: com is a satirical site that targets the medical field, often confusing people who are not familiar with medical terminology or practices.
The author of the claim: Kim LaCapria, is a former writer for Snopes, a fact-checking website, suggesting that the claim was not intended to be taken seriously.
